org.richfaces.fragment.inplaceSelect

Interface InplaceSelect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RichFacesInplaceSelect

    public interface InplaceSelect

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextInputComponent getTextInput()
      Gets the associated text input.
      ConfirmOrCancel select(ChoicePicker picker)
      Selects the first option according to the given picker param.
      ConfirmOrCancel select(int index)
      Selects the option from the list of the options at index.
      ConfirmOrCancel select(String text)
      Selects the first option, which matches the given text.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        ConfirmOrCancel select(ChoicePicker picker)
        Selects the first option according to the given picker param. In other words, it selects the first option which satisfies the choice picking rules defined in picker
        Parameters:
        picker - for defining the rules by which the suggestion will be selected
        Returns:
        object by which a user can actually change the select value (confirm), or return to the previous input value (cancel)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element which satisfies the rules given by picker

      • select

        ConfirmOrCancel select(int index)
        Selects the option from the list of the options at index.
        Parameters:
        index - index of option
        Returns:
        object by which a user can actually change the select value (confirm), or return to the previous input value (cancel)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element with index index

      • select

        ConfirmOrCancel select(String text)
        Selects the first option, which matches the given text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text of the option to be selected
        Returns:
        object by which a user can actually change the select value (confirm), or return to the previous input value (cancel)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element with text representation matching the given text

      • getTextInput

        TextInputComponent getTextInput()
        Gets the associated text input.
        Returns:
        the text input of the component
        See Also:
        TextInputComponentImpl
